one_reviews_text: It's important to buy/fund apps like this, so that creators can continue to push the limits.  Even if you're a VR veteran (like myself) you'll look at the motion capture techniques used in this (to capture a real performance) and be awed. Even after getting used to the character animations in Alyx nothing can prepare you for seeing a truly human performance in VR.  It's a little rough around the edges but a true glimse into the future of the VR movie medium.

One of the most beautiful graphics I have ever seen in VR.  The music, lighting and acting were fantastic!  The reason I would not give this 5 stars however is because of two reasons: 1. The whole experience is only about 10 mins long and 2. There is very little one can do besides watching it all.  A click here and there is all that is required.  I was hoping for something that was more like a game but it is more of a short movie.  Still a very immersive experience and I can't wait for the next part to be released!
This should be the benchmark of future cinematic VR. The acting was incredible, the music was perfect, and the immersion is unreal. Looking forward to Episode 2 already!
review_feedback: Thanks for your feedback DreamerO. Glad to know you enjoyed it and your kind words are much appreciated.

one_reviews_text: Too short and very limited activty or interaction. For £5.99, the expectations were higher. Would like to think Episode 2 would be discounted or free if you have bought Episode 1, based on this.
review_feedback: Thanks for your feedback sjvickers and we will take all of this into consideration

one_reviews_text:
It is more like a demo.
10 minutes 
Maybe worth 2 bucks.
review_feedback: Thanks for your interest in the project and for your feedback.

one_reviews_text: Was interesting, but not interesting enough to bring me back for more.  Pretty short, but great graphics and well presented.   Worth a try if you like dramatic movies.  Not much to do but sit and watch.
review_feedback: Thanks for the review profmjg787 and appreciate your feedback
